tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dear Dr. Sudhakar,

I wanted to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional care and attention you've provided me with throughout my dental treatment. Your unwavering dedication to ensuring my well-being, despite me not being the most profitable patient, truly speaks volumes about your professionalism and compassion. I deeply appreciate the personalized care and expertise you and your team have consistently demonstrated. Thank you for going above and beyond to complete my treatment and for making me feel valued as a patient.

With sincere appreciation,
Sivajayanthinathar B
reply_text: Thank you so much sir. It was all possible only because of your patience. Happy to solve your issue. Keep smiling as always

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: For someone who was always terrified to visit a dentist, the doctor was very friendly, explained the problem and dental procedure in simple terms. Patiently answered all my doubts. He kept talking to me during the entire dental procedure, making me feel completely at ease. To my surprise, I felt absolutely no pain during or post surgery. It was very nice to see the doctor follow up post surgery.
reply_text: Thank you so much.... Pleased with your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited for Dental Implant treatment for my mom. Had an implant procedure done with  Doctor Sudhakar. He was very helpful  & understanding throughout the procedure, be it explaining the treatment, precautions during the implantation & Suggestions after the procedure got done. Everything went smooth and happy with the service provided. Would definitely recommend the dental care.
reply_text: Thanks for the kind words mam... Pleased to solve your issue

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My daughter is bit nervous about removing her milk teeth, but Dr. Sudhakar comfort her with his friendly approch and he keep on talking to her until the whole process. reply_text: My pleasure mam... Thanks too
